name: Chemical Peel - PLACE mixtape
description:
-Double sided acid-free paper sleeve with custom painted CD-R
-Numbered edition of 77
-Shipping free within Canada and US, email for international orders

-Upon ordering the limited edition CD-R you will receive an email with download link to 'Chemical Peel' in high-quality MP3 file format (320 kbps LAME encoded, fully tagged - plays on any MP3 player) w/ PDF booklet

Tracklist:

1. Introduction (pH)
2. Skin Deep (pH)
3. Boats in the Desert (Ghost Class)
4. With Alchemy [pH remix] (Boyscout Killers)
5. Kumon Go (Adam Saikaley)
6. Radio Basket (Lefty)
7. World Drenched in Human [Ghost Class remix] (ITEF)
8. Stuck in the Tube (Tauno)
9. Big Head in the Skyline (Tauno)
10. Zeal (Hmmm)
11. Slight Changes in Rhythm (Adam Saikaley)

Chemical Peel represents a first for the label and its patrons, offering a cross-border OTT/MTL hybrid compilation of new electronics. Individual members of Montreal-based Boyscout Killers join Place mainstays pH, Tauno, Hmmm, and Ion That Eats Its Face to create a broad and seamless range of offerings, with atmospheres giving way to glitchier synth elements as the story unfolds. Also featured is Ottawa's resident sound specialist Adam Saikaley, courteously delivering two resonating tracks.

Released: 10/30/09
Mastered by Sean Campbell

Also featured is Ottawa's resident specialist Adam Saikaley, courteously delivering two resonating tracks.

name: Everything is Air - pH / ITEF Split EP
description:
-Double sided acid-free paper sleeve with custom painted CD-R
-Numbered edition of 77
-Shipping free within Canada and US, email for international orders

-Upon ordering the limited edition CD-R you will receive an email with download link to 'Everything is Air' in high-quality MP3 file format (320 kbps LAME encoded, fully tagged - plays on any MP3 player) w/ PDF booklet

Tracklisting:

   1. Salutations (pH)
   2. Construction Paper (pH)
   3. Take It (pH)
   4. Anaximenes the Hungry (pH remix)
   5. World Drenched in Human (ITEF)
   6. Between Trains (ITEF)
   7. Anaximenes the Hungry (ITEF)

pH and Ion That Eats Its Face are proud to announce the recent issuance of their freshman effort on Place Records – Everything Is Air. Featuring original and remixed tracks from both artists, the work represents a true achievement in collaboration. 

Released: 8/25/09
Mastered by Sean Campbell
Album artwork by Katherine Saleria
